record.title: PRINTING OF PROCEEDINGS HAD DURING RECESS
record.narrative:
PRINTING OF PROCEEDINGS HAD DURING RECESS -- (House of Representatives - April 30, 2008)

[Page: H2863]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that the proceedings had during the recess be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Missouri?
